720793f-a.text:
Lafayette Street, west side, south from Great Jones Street.
June 23, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
720793f-a.folder: Lafayette Street & Great Jones Street, Manhattan, NY
720793f-a.original_title: Manhattan: Lafayette Street - Great Jones Street

720141f-a.text:
Great Jones Street, at, adjoining and east of the S.E. corner of
Lafayette (Elm) Street.
March 16, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
720141f-a.folder: Great Jones Street & Lafayette Street, Manhattan, NY
720141f-a.original_title: Manhattan: Great Jones Street - Lafayette Street

720792f-a.text:
(1)
380, 382, and 384-388 (only part of which is shown) Lafayette Street (running from left to right in centre of view), west side, from Great Jones Street (left, running from fore to background), to but not including East 4th Street. Also shown is Great Jones Street, north side, west from Lafayette to Broadway. The gasoline station is at the N.E.
corner of Great Jones Street.
March 16, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing a complete view of No. 384-388, a 12-story
building at the S.W. corner of East 4th Street.
March 16, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.

720791f-a.text:
375-379 Lafayette Street (left), at the N.E. corner of Great Jones Street. This 9-story loft building was demolished and its site is now
(1937) occupied bv a Socony gasoline station.
September 19, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
